short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UMP AutoLogin - allow you to login with saved username, password and role

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Forget about logging in to UMP Ecom manually again. This extension will help you to save a lot of time by logging in to Ecomâ€¦

This extension will help you to save a lot of time by logging in to Ecom automatically every time you open https://community.ump.edu.my/ecommstaff/login_eccom/
Warning: Not encouraged to be installed on public computers.
